attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are currently not supposed to sing "baa baa black sheep" in nurseries and preschools. This is on the presumption that it sounds negative and racist. This has angered many preschool teachers and they believe it's political correctness gone mad and they are not the only ones. Children do not associate this nursery rhyme with people, they associate it with sheep. Black sheep, which do exist.

rejection.details: There is no legislation banning the use of these songs.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
